nameEntry.part: Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives

biogHist.abstract: The Sisters of Mercy's Bathurst Congregational Archives are located in Bathurst and held the records of the Bathurst congregation of the Sisters of Mercy, including the orphanages and children's homes they ran, until 2011. In December 2011 the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives became part of Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository.

descriptiveNote.p: These Certificates were transferred to the Sisters of Mercy Archives, Bathurst after the closure of the orphanage in 1975, and remained there until 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Notifications of Reception, St Josephs' Orphanage, Goulburn (1917 - 1959)

descriptiveNote.p: These 'Notifications of Reception' records were managed by the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives till 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Roll Books, St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (1924 - 1975)
Notification of Reception Books, St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (1915 - 1936)

descriptiveNote.p: The Notification of Reception Books were held by the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives until 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Notice of Reception, Discharge, Death or Admission to Hospital of a Child Books, St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (1964 - 1975)

descriptiveNote.p: The Notice of Reception, Discharge, Death or Admission to Hospital of a Child Books were held at the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives until 2011.

The Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives managed the records of Croagh Patrick Orphanage until December 2011, when the congregation became part of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG)

The Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives managed the records of St Joseph's Orphanage until December 2011, when the congregation became part of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG)
The Croagh Patrick Orphanage Records were held by the Bathurst Congregational Archives until December 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Admission Registers, St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (1867 - 1938)

descriptiveNote.p: The Admission registers from St Joseph's Orphanage were held by the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives until December 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (2011 - )

descriptiveNote.p: In December 2011, the Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives became part of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea (ISMAPNG).

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia (1981 - 2011)

descriptiveNote.p: The Sisters of Mercy, Bathurst Congregational Archives was part of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of Australia (ISMA) until 2011.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Record Cards, St Joseph's Orphanage, Bathurst (1962 - 1968)

descriptiveNote.p: These Record Cards were transferred to the Sisters of Mercy Archives, Bathurst, in mid-August 2001.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Institute of Sisters of Mercy of Australia and Papua New Guinea Archives, Bathurst Repository (2011 - )
